title: HardGuy’s Bizarre Adventure - Novel Updates
tags: Adventurers   Fantasy World   Magic   Male Protagonist   Reincarnated in Another World
author: 和村中叶
description: If you are fed up with protagonists who reincarnate by accident and coincidentally become the savior or conqueror of another world, here comes another choice – A passionate adventurer who struggled to live for nothing more than a sole wish: to explore and enjoy the view that no one has seen before.>
